education_text.0: She served on the mathematics faculty of the University of British Columbia from 1957 till 1968, where she introduced numerical analysis and computer courses into the curriculum and was instrumental in the formation of the Computer Science DepartmentFroese Fischer spent  at the      Harvard College Observatory Harvard College Observatory, where she extended her research on structure calculationsFroese Fischer is the author of over 300 research articles on computational atomic theory, many of which have had reaching impact in the area of structure calculationsFroese Fischer is currently an emerita research professor of computer science at      Vanderbilt University Vanderbilt University and a Guest Scientist in the Atomic Spectroscopy Group at      redirect    NISTFroese Fischer is currently an emerita research professor of computer science at      Vanderbilt University Vanderbilt University and a Guest Scientist in the Atomic Spectroscopy Group at      redirect    NISTFroese Fischer is currently an emerita research professor of computer science at      Vanderbilt University Vanderbilt University and a Guest Scientist in the Atomic Spectroscopy Group at      redirect    NIST
